amendatorysection.catchline: Comprehensive stroke center, designated thrombectomy-capable stroke center, primary stroke center, or acute stroke-ready hospital; restriction on advertisement.
amendatorysection.para: A person may not advertise to the public, by way of any medium, that a hospital is a comprehensive stroke center, a designated thrombectomy-capable stroke center, a primary stroke center, or an acute stroke-ready hospital unless the hospital is listed as such by the Department of Health and Human Services under the Stroke System of Care Act.

crossreference.para: Stroke System of Care Act, see section 71-4201.
